channel.title: Help with compiling
channel.description: Hey yeh my classpath and path keep on resetting themselves when i edit them to what they are supposed to say. i have jdk6u7 and i don't know what im doing wrong. help

item.title: Help with compiling
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

Noob.Coder:

That should work God A5390, and if it doesn’t work then try editing using a system compiler that doesn’t require the JDK, it is a less formal way of compiling but… It’ll help.

To compile a Java file, you need the Java Development Kit, as this is the kit that contains Javac, the Java compiler.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with compiling
item.dc:creator: @tajkillerscape tajkillerscape
item.description:
@tajkillerscape wrote:

try using my famous complier well here it is… @echo off title tajkillerscape compiler echo ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: echo :: Welcome to tajtas Compiler For Java 6.07 :: echo ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

gl with your server.

Read full topic

@Noob.Coder wrote:

item.title: Help with compiling
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

Right click ‘edit’ on your compiler.
There should be a standard code such as:

@echo off title *TITLE* "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

Edit jdk1.6.0_07 to whatever type of JDK version you have.

Read full topic
